com.airs.platform

Class TCPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airs.platform.TCPClient

  • public class TCPClient
extends Object
    Class implementing the TCP client for the remote sensing connection to your own application server

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean connected
      true, if currently connected, false otherwise
      String IMEI
      String holding the phone's IMEI number which is used for authorisation purposes at the application server

      TCPClient()

    • Method Detail

      • startTCP

        public boolean startTCP(AIRS_remote airs,
               String IPAddress,
               String IPPort)
        Starts the TCP client
        Parameters:
        airs - Reference to the AIRS_remote service calling this TCP client
        IPAddress - String holding the IP address to connect to
        IPPort - Port of the application server to connect to
        Returns:
        true, if successful, or false otherwise

      • connect

        public void connect(String IPAddress,
           String Port)
        Connecting to application server with IP:port information
        Parameters:
        IPAddress - String of the IP address of the application server to connect to
        Port - port number of the application server

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnecting from application server

      • write

        public boolean write(com.airs.platform.Method method)
        Writes a Method to current TCP connection
        Parameters:
        method - Reference to the Method to be written

      • read

        public com.airs.platform.Method read()
        Reads Method from TCP connection
        Returns:
        Reference to Method that was read
